'''A_SetPainThreshold''' (int ''threshold'' [, int ''ptr''])
== Usage == Changes the calling actor ([[Actor Pointers|pointer]])'s {{c|{{Property|PainThreshold}}}} to ''threshold''. The higher the pain threshold is, the more damage a shootable actor must take in order to have a chance to enter its pain states, depending on {{c|{{Property|PainChance}}}}.
=== Parameters === * ''threshold'': The actor's new pain threshold. * ''ptr'': The [[Actor Pointers|pointer]] to set it upon.
